publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-354.1 Tommy Sheridan: First Report of the Procedures Committee—As an amendment to motion (S1M-354) in the name of Mr Murray Tosh, after "that draft" insert "with the addition of, in Rule 5.6.1(b), after "under Rule 5.2.2" insert "or by members who do not represent a political party."" Supported by: Dennis Canavan*, Robin Harper*
